laboratory_examinations.findings: 1.2 mmol/L (within normal range of 0.5 to 2.0 mmol/L).

The liver demonstrates homogeneous attenuation with a peripherally hyperenhancing 1.2 x 1.5 cm lesion in segment 6 of the liver. The appendix is dilated and fluid-filled measuring up to 1 cm with calcified fecaliths and periappendiceal stranding.
